coding with passion.heading: Coding with passion
coding with passion.p1: My coding adventure began when I turned 15.
coding with passion.p2: Since then, I've been spending most of my free time developing and perfecting my skills in that field.
coding with passion.p3: Quality of my code isn't indifferent to me - I always try to look for solutions, that will make my code readable and effective.

experience with design.heading: Experience in graphic design
experience with design.p1: Before I started programming, I was focused on graphic design.
experience with design.p2: The skills and experience I've aquired back then, help me with animations and user interfaces up to this day.

backend.C#: solid understanding of the language - advanced async, SOLID principles, design patterns;
backend.NET: familarity with the runtime environment, especially .NET Core;

frontend.JavaScript: ECMAScript 6+, basics of TypeScript, basic knowledge of JS ecosystem;
frontend.Vuejs: Vue CLI, transitions, filters, async components, Vuex store;
frontend.axios: basic REST API requests; request middleware;

design.Photoshop: image correction and manipulation; layers, masks, adjustments etc.;
design.Illustrator: shape building; logo design; exporting to SVG format;
design.PremierePro: video editing, syncing, montage; basic color correction;
design.figmaadobexd: basic design and prototyping for UI/UX.
